name: Books of Consciousness
description:
The game presents a short story of how the perspective of a person changes the more knowledge he accumulates throughout his life.

Collect all the books and avoid all obstacles attain knowledge to reach the end.

Team:

Dionisis Rigopoulos

Angelo Giannoudakis

Thanasis Pappoutsidakis
